<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/v1/comment/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a Comment by Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the Comment"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"text":{"description":"Comment text/message","type":"string"},"supporMarkdown":{"description":"Whether this comment supports markdown","type":"boolean"}},"title":"commentsPatch"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
